Trade/Device Name(s): PATHIAM System with iScan for p53 and Ki-67
PATHIAM System with iScan for p53
PATHIAM System with iScan for Ki-67
Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded normal and neoplastic tissues
Methodologies: Nuclear intensity and percent positivity quantification
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PATHIAM System with iScan, a digital pathology system and image analysis software for quantification of p53 and Ki-67 protein expression in breast tissue immunohistochemistry.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids pathologists in quantifying p53 accumulation and Ki-67 proliferative activity in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded breast tissue specimens stained by immunohistochemistry, used with appropriate IVD reagents and in context of clinical history.
